item.description:
Our "chefess"/hostess extraordinaire will guide us in preparing and cooking Mexican cuisine (you may want to dust off and bring your aprons as everyone will be helping out) . There will be a nominal charge (divided evenly among all attendees - approximately $12 to $15 per person) to pay for the food that our hostess will purchase prior to the event.. This is a BYOB (Mexican, Spanish, or South American wine/beer would be good choices - only bring one) event, which we'll share with each other.

The hostess sent me to following info about what will be on the menu:

The menu is as follows:

Wine & Beer: Your choice (only bring one). Mexican, Spanish or South American preferred (if you can't find one of these, just do your best)
Appetizers: quesadellas, tortilla chips with guacamole, black bean and corn salsa
Beef Chili with cornbread
Desert: Tres Leches cake (and possibly Kahlua chocolate mousse <- yummy, this sounds good!)

This should definitely produce endorphins. If not, you'll just have to engorge yourself with more wine or beer.

I will send out a follow-up email with more information (directions, etc.) on Thursday, November 18th, to those who have been responded Yes.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Reminder: Wine, Beer, & Cooking Event, Wethersfield, Nov 20 @ 6:00 PM
